item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I built a DIY plane spotting system at home (50 points | 7 comments)
2. Arsenal FC AI Research Engineer Job Posting (17 points | 1 comment)
3. Pixelfed Hit 500K Users (105 points | 13 comments)
4. I got OpenAI o1 to play the boardgame Codenames and it's super good (98 points | 52 comments)
5. How to build your own ZX80/ZX81 (2019) (38 points | 9 comments)
6. The Mythical IO-Bound Rails App (74 points | 13 comments)
7. An overview of gradient descent optimization algorithms (2016) (80 points | 12 comments)
8. Life lessons from the first half-century of my career (254 points | 79 comments)
9. Advent of Code 2024 and BQN (39 points | 5 comments)
10. How far can you get in 40 minutes from each subway station in NYC? (115 points | 66 comments)
11. Hacker infects 18,000 "script kiddies" with fake malware builder (56 points | 17 comments)
12. Show HN: Cs16.css – CSS library based on Counter Strike 1.6 UI (713 points | 119 comments)
13. Show HN: Trolling SMS spammers with Ollama (255 points | 94 comments)
14. Inboxbooster (YC W17) Is Hiring ( | hide)
15. TinyZero (149 points | 22 comments)
16. Liberux Nexx: Linux smartphone (found on Galaxus, Swiss online reseller) (4 points | 1 comment)
17. Show HN: Using YOLO to Detect Office Chairs in 40M Hotel Photos (179 points | 94 comments)
18. File Explorer is merged to Helix editor (192 points | 24 comments)
19. Doorbell camera catches rare footage of meteorite striking home's front walkway (26 points | 15 comments)
20. Show HN: Lightpanda, an open-source headless browser in Zig (257 points | 122 comments)
21. Wild – A fast linker for Linux (347 points | 167 comments)
22. Show HN: Habby – A straightforward bullet journal with habit tracking (30 points | 6 comments)
23. A phishing attack involving g.co, Google's URL shortener (323 points | 137 comments)
24. The FizzBuzz that did not get me the job (299 points | 244 comments)
25. IEEE Credentialing Program (3 points | discuss)
26. Snowdrop OS – a homebrew operating system from scratch, in assembly language (268 points | 57 comments)
27. The hidden complexity of scaling WebSockets (157 points | 56 comments)
28. First Look: Loops, by Pixelfed – Decentralised TikTok Competitor (2024) (163 points | 96 comments)
29. Ask HN: Moving a not-for-profit web app off AWS (5 points | 13 comments)
30. Subpixel Snake [video] (256 points | 49 comments)
